h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - First Prince of Flowing Sands
content: Some scarier attacks that the First Prince can employ will have him stand up holding his arms to the side, then stumbling forward in a large swing as he topples down on his side, which covers a large area both from the arm swipe and body slam. Be sure to dodge to the side he puts his arms up and you’ll avoid him swinging in the opposite direction.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Despair' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - First Prince of Flowing Sands'.
The content is as follows:
Some scarier attacks that the First Prince can employ will have him stand up holding his arms to the side, then stumbling forward in a large swing as he topples down on his side, which covers a large area both from the arm swipe and body slam. Be sure to dodge to the side he puts his arms up and you’ll avoid him swinging in the opposite direction.
